meanings.definition: A long piece of cloth worn around the neck for decorative purposes.
meanings.sent1: He wore a colorful necktie to the party.
meanings.sent2: Neckties come in various patterns and colors.
meanings.sent3: The necktie looked like a rainbow around his neck.
meanings.sent4: His necktie was a splash of color against his white shirt.
meanings.sent5: She always chooses a silk necktie for special occasions.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a necktie.
meanings.sent1: He will necktie his shirt for a more formal look.
meanings.sent2: She neckties her scarf to keep it from falling off.
meanings.sent3: He tried to necktie his shoes together as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The vines necktie the branches together in a natural embrace.
meanings.sent5: She carefully neckties the package with a ribbon.
